name: caseDashboardPaginationFeature
description: Enables pagination of the cases on the dashboard

name: newAuditFeature
description: Toggle to enable new auditing - only do so in production at the same time as migrating old data

name: createCaseAddressInputFeature
description: Toggle to enable address input upon case creation as a field for contact information

name: caseTaggingFeature
description: Toggle to enable new case tagging feature

name: cnComplaintTypeFeature
description: Civilian within NOPD complainant type feature
